objects.text:
100% Pure & Natural • Rich in Nutrients & Calcium
No Artificial Additives • Fresh from Local Farms
Creamy Texture & Rich Taste • Glass Bottled

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Pure Dairy Milk - Straight From Nature's Source
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure and Natural Whole Milk
• No artificial additives or preservatives
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Fresh from local dairy farms
• Perfect for drinking, cooking, and baking
• Available in various sizes: pitcher and bottle options
• Pasteurized for food safety
• Creamy texture and rich taste
• Excellent source of protein and vitamins
• Packaged in high-quality glass containers
• Farm-to-table freshness guaranteed
• Ideal for growing children and active adults

banner_details:
This banner promotes a dairy product with a modern, clean design that conveys freshness and quality. The background features flowing gradient waves of soft blue and white tones with circular accents and soft dot textures to evoke purity and organic elements. At the top, the "heading" text layer is bold and prominent, immediately attracting attention. The "tagline" text below it enhances the organic and natural appeal. Centrally placed is a high-quality "product_image" showing glass bottles filled with milk, lending a premium, trustworthy feel. Descriptive points summarizing product features appear in the "description" text layer. Near the bottom, the bold "price" text layer is followed by a distinctive rectangular button holding the "cta" text layer (“ORDER NOW”), encouraging action.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #e8f4fc
- Powder Blue: #c5e1f9
- Deep Navy: #1a4a76
- Rich Blue: #2b5f8a
- Accent Blue: #3c7cb7
- Light Bubble Blue: #92c4e9
- Pure White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image features a clean and fresh aesthetic centered around milk, contained in transparent glassware. The dominant color is creamy white (#FDFDFD), representing purity and freshness. The subtle translucent blue tones of the glass bottle and jug handles add a cool contrast, invoking cleanliness and coolness, with shades like icy blue (#A3C9E2), glass-reflection blue (#C9E6F3), and light cyan (#DDF1FB). These cool hues blend smoothly with the milky whites, enhancing depth and clarity. The overall color palette is minimal yet effective, ideal for an advertisement banner that conveys freshness, health, and simplicity. Soft gradients strengthen visual appeal while maintaining purity.
